data.title: The village of Priatu, municipality of Sant'Antonio di Gallura (OT) Sardegna
data.text:
The village of Priatu belongs to the municipality of Sant'Antonio di Gallura, in the province of Olbia-Tempio, region Sardegna.

The village of Priatu is 6,08 kilometers far from the same town of Sant'Antonio di Gallura to whom it belongs.

>>>COVID-19<<< Data about spreading of Covid-19 in Priatu are not yet available.

For the province of Olbia-Tempio, to whom Priatu belongs, on are reported 0 cases. In the previos day there were 0 cases, thus having a variation of 0 cases, i.e. 0.00% with reference to the number of cases reported in the previous day.

Please follow this link for updated information on Covid-19 including new cases and percentage changes for the whole of Italy, regions and individual provinces

In the municipality of Sant'Antonio di Gallura also rises the locality of Case sparse that is -- kilometres far from Sant'Antonio di Gallura.

The locality of Priatu rises 345 meters above sea level.

Data about population living in Priatu

In the village of Priatu live one hundred and eighty-nine people: one hundred and two are males and eighty-seven are females.

There are seventy singles (fourty-five males and twenty-five females). There are ninety-eight people married, and one people legally separed. There are also three divorced people and seventeen widows and widowers.

Data about foreigners living in Priatu

In Priatu live fourteen foreigners, five are males and nine are females. 8 come from Europa, 5 from Africa, 1 from America, 0 from Asia and 0 from Oceania.

Education in Priatu

There are in Priatu one hundred and eighty-one people in school age, ninety-eight are males and eighty-three females.

Employment rates and workers in Priatu

There are in Priatu 79 people aged 15 years or more. 63 are employed and 15 were previously employed but now are unemployed and seeking for a new job. There are 54 males aged 15 years or more, 40 are employed and 13 were previously employed but now are unemployed and seeking for a new job. There are 25 females aged 15 years or more, 23 are employed and 2 s were previously employed but now are unemployed and seeking for a new job.

Families and their compositions

There are in Priatu 84 famiglie residenti, for a total of 189 people.

Please find in what follows a table showing the number of families along with the number of people for each family.

People123456 or more Families2625211020

There are 84 famiglie living in Priatu. 8 live in rented houses, 60 live in houses of their own propertyÃÂ and 16 live in houses for different reasons.

The buildings and their characteristics in Priatu

There are in Priatu 73 buildings, but only 71 are used. 68 buildings are for residential use, 3 buildings are for commercial or productive pourposes. Among the 68 buildings for residential use 53 were build using bricks of tuffs, 0 were built in concrete and 15 were built using other materials like steel, wood and so on. Among the 68 buildings for residential use 17 are in excellent condition, 40 are in good conditions, 11 are in mediocre conditions and 0 are in bad conditions.
